summary: I can not even describe it.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Making Of[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][youtube]VaF1Ga1deK4[/youtube][youtube]baISrvTKE6c[/youtube][/font]
[/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod will change the shape of Alduin to make it more fearsome. Since this is only changes to meshes, it won't touch to your textures at all so you can use 4-8k Dragons, Bellyache or anything that changes the dragons. Video should be enough. [/size]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]You can install it automatically by manager or manually dragging this to your data folder. Overwrite if asks.
[/size]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5][center][color=#6aa84f]Q&A[/color][/center]
Q:[/size] [size=3]Will this effect Alduin's actions, power and such?[/size]
[size=5]A:[/size][size=3] No it won't.

[/size][size=5]Q:[/size][size=3] There's really no difference mate.[/size]
[size=5]A:[/size][size=3] Yes, I noticed that. Path was Data\Meshes\Actors instead of Data\Meshes\Actors\Alduim :)[/size][/font]
author: ProtologolusX
